section.title: Reporting verbs
section.sectiontitle: Reporting verbs show the function of the original piece of speech.
section.text2: "You shouldn't go to that club. It's dangerous there."
section.text2a: He warned them not to go to the club.
section.sectiontitle2: Reporting verbs use different patterns (e.g. verb + ing, verb + object + that clause). The majority use verb + that clause. Some reporting verbs can use more than one pattern.
section.text3: He recommended that we stay near the beach.
section.text4: She advised us to go to the museum.
